name: Searing Signet
description: To torture a magic user, one must devise means far beyond the mundane.

abilities.name: Burn Through
abilities.description: Instances of magic damage from spells over a threshold ignite enemies if they are within range, causing them to take damage over time.
notes: Does not apply the debuff if the enemy is out of range from the source
Already applied debuffs persist, even if the target moves out of range
Reapplying the buff refreshes the duration
Deals 3 (3.9 with Dormant Curio) damage in 0.25-second intervals, resulting in 24 damage instances
Does not trigger on Radiance, Urn of Shadows, and Spirit Vessel
The damage from Poison Attack is direct HP Removal, so it does not trigger any on-damage effects

additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
When crafted with the Dormant Curio, the total damage is increased by 30%
